# 設定匯率 exchange_rate = 30.0 # 1 USD = 30 TWD # 輸入金額和換算方向 amount = float(input("請輸入金額: ")) direction = input("請選擇方向 (TWD to USD 或 USD to TWD): ") # 換算並顯示結果 if direction == "TWD to USD": result = amount / exchange_rate print(f"{amount} 台幣 等於 {result:.2f} 美金") elif direction == "USD to TWD": result = amount * exchange_rate print(f"{amount} 美金 等於 {result:.2f} 台幣") else: print("請輸入正確的換算方向")
